Royal Copenhagen

Blue Elements was launched in 2011 and is inspired by the jagged edging from Flora Danica, classic fluting, exquisite lace and luxurious flower motifs

Dyb tallkerken
599,00 DKK vejl.udsalgspris

  • The main flower in the classic pattern is called chrysanthemum
  • The Royal Copenhagen blue is called Cobalt Zinc Silicate
  • A blue-painter spends four years learning his or her craft
